donate.title: Support the Project
donate.subtitle: Mindra is built to support and motivate people. Any contribution helps us ship new features and languages.
donate.goal.title: Why we raise funds
donate.goal.text: Funds go to app development, servers and the team. Target: $150,000. The more we raise, the faster we ship and add new features.
donate.goal.points.1: FaceTime with Mindra — choose the avatar and talk face-to-face.
donate.goal.points.2: All bot features in one place: dialog, goals, habits, reports.
donate.goal.points.3: 11 languages, friendly UI, offline mode in the future.
